title: French pension reforms: Is Macron's government doomed by crisis?
description: No-confidence motions face the Macron government as it tries to force its unpopular changes into law.

title: Southern Ecuador earthquake kills at least 12
description: A strong earthquake off Ecuador's southern coast left people trapped in collapsed houses.

title: William Hill: Gambling addict says bookmaker didn't help him stop
description: A teacher says William Hill should have done more to stop him betting when he was staking thousands.

title: 'Antonio Conte blames Tottenham players but is part of club's problems'
description: Antonio Conte is going down swinging at Tottenham but must accept some of the blame, writes Phil McNulty.

title: Six Nations: Ireland beat England 29-16 to win Grand Slam - highlights
description: Watch highlights as Ireland beat an England team reduced to 14 men 29-16 to win the Six Nations Grand Slam.

title: Chelsea 2-2 Everton: Ellis Simms secures last-minute draw at Stamford Bridge
description: Ellis Simms scores his first Everton goal to earn Sean Dyche's side a precious point as they come from behind twice to draw at Chelsea.

title: Six Nations 2023: Ireland captain Johnny Sexton says Grand Slam win 'like living in a dream'
description: Emotional Ireland captain Johnny Sexton describes winning the Grand Slam and Six Nations title as "like living in a dream".

title: Antonio Conte criticises Tottenham Hotspur ownership and 'selfish' players
description: A furious Antonio Conte says his Tottenham players are "selfish" and the club "can change the manager but the situation cannot change".

title: Manchester City 6-0 Burnley: Erling Haaland scores hat-trick in thumping win over Vincent Kompany's side
description: Erling Haaland scores his sixth hat-trick of the season and passes the 40-goal mark as Manchester City thrash Vincent Kompany's Burnley to reach the FA Cup semi-finals.

description: Ireland win their fourth Grand Slam as they wear down 14-man England in a tense Six Nations finale in Dublin.

title: Six Nations 2023: Freddie Steward's red card against Ireland called 'an utter farce'
description: A red card given to England full-back Freddie Steward in Saturday's defeat by Grand Slam winners Ireland has been called "an utter farce" and "absolutely ridiculous" by former players.

title: Russia and Ukraine extend grain deal despite disagreement
description: The renewed accord means exports can continue via Ukraine's Black Sea ports, but it is unclear how long for.

title: Match of the Day: 'Great to be here', says Lineker as he makes TV return
description: Lineker hosts BBC sports coverage for first time after being taken off air in an impartiality row.

title: Saudi Arabian Grand Prix qualifying: Sergio Perez on pole as Max Verstappen 15th after issue

title: RAF Scampton: Historians pen letter against WW2 airfield migrant plan

title: Gary Lineker says 'it's great to be here' on BBC football return
